channel.title: Girlfriend Phone Conversation question lol
channel.description:
Well,
Lately me and my girlfriend Maliesha has been talking a lot less lately and I don't want our conversations to seem boring. I would ask my m8s but they be actin funny when they nervous to get their own girl :|, so err... If you can't help me with this at least; do you know a good site i can get help from?
Here is how I would start off...
I call her number, she picked up and I ask what shes doing and she says nothing, so I just get stuck there >.>... Idk what else to say lol

item.title: Girlfriend Phone Conversation question lol
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:25, topic:294460”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=389461.msg2933030#msg2933030 date=1251396713]

i cant imagine possibly being with someone and “struggling for things to talk about”

why the fuck would i be with them in the first place :S

That’s pretty much it. If you don’t have or can’t find things to talk about then it’s over. Some things I found helpful in the beginning of relationships are talking about family, movies, activities and the like. Make sure you talk about her, not you unless she asks, because they love it when you talk about them.
[/quote]

however, if they actually ask about you, they probably do want to know a bit about you gotta do a bit of both ways nomsain[/quote]

Of course, you just don’t want to constantly talk about yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Girlfriend Phone Conversation question lol
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

It’s a rather common problem with fresh couples actually. I noticed that majority of the responses have been telling you that it’s useless because you simply don’t have the communication required for a healthy relationship. This is only half correct. The communication lines can be established at any point as long as the two personalities mesh. How do you know if they mesh? You just know. It’s like a blind man trying to explain the color of the ocean.

Phone calls can be awkward if you aren’t prepared. With time, comes flow. Flow is the goal in this game. It basically means one subject leads to the next with very little effort. During the beginning stages, pushes from both sides are required to establish this flow and to sometimes maintain it (in some cases). I’m going to give you a few pointers. I’m not sure how effective they will be on her, but i’m sure you can customize it to suit her personality.

  • Be Relaxed. This is very important. After all, the flow means both sides are fairly relaxed. Who cares if you thumble, mumble your words or even say something completely wrong. People are generally forgiving.

  • Be open. Discuss anything and everything. Tell them how your day went, what you ate earlier or some goal of yours. Who cares, phone calls are all about useless rubbish.

  • Who cares if your lame. Interesting makes a personality and a strong personality aids in the development of a steady and reliable relationship.

  • Have the right mix of serious talk and just fucking around. Don’t cross them over though. There is a time for everything and even the most idiotic of people can figure out when that is.

If conversation is slow at the start, just ask them to run you through there day start to finish. Women don’t keep their mouth shut. Ask certain parts of it and cut in at certain points. Life isn’t that hard, you are just over thinking things. I hope this helped you somewhat. It’s your choice if you wish to take advice from a random stranger on a Runescape cheating forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Girlfriend Phone Conversation question lol
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

first things first… lets split this up…
she’s a girl… I’m going to be quite stereo typical
girls like to talk so main thing is ask some quite vague questions… she’ll get to talk your ear off… everyone is happy… take an interest in what she has done today how she is feeling both physically and mentally so basically show you care

now for the amazing bit… she’s also a friend…
friends talk about common interests
and in my circle of friends we just talk a load of bollocks about random ideas of how we can make the world better or different species we will never see as they live too far under water…
that might be a bit too deep for you too but yea that’s just a few pointers…

philosophical and political debates make for a long long… long… long… however quite interesting conversation however they aren’t for everyone

hope that helps a little

Read full topic

item.title: Girlfriend Phone Conversation question lol
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Lol. I’m surprised that you have a girlfriend if you can’t even have a proper conversation without sweating it (you sure you have a gf and you’re not imagining it?). Just go with the flow: call her, ask her how/what she’s doing, tell her you’re gonna meet later somewhere. If you still want to talk, then do! “Hey, so I was wondering when we’re gonna have our first baby ;)?” etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Girlfriend Phone Conversation question lol
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Surely if you see this girl in real life you find things to talk about? I never talk on the phone with my girlfriend unless its a short conversation about plans we’ve made (E.g. i’ll be at yours in 50 minutes; okay see you then). We mainly talk on msn or over sms.

When I don’t see my girlfriend for a long time we struggle for things to talk about. So basically go see her more.

Read full topic
